summary: Collect firewood from all trees in Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to collect firewood from almost every tree in Skyrim, no need to look for chopping blocks!


- Features:

You won\'t need an axe to collect wood.
In order to keep it realistic, i\'ve set the chance to harvest firewood to 15 to 50% depending on the time of the year.

- Planned:
Axe required for chopping
Maybe add the possibility to harvest firewood from fallen trees
Chopping animation
Changing the Trees to Stumps after chopping, and having them regrow
author: Maverick-106
